nodes.text: The Star Wars Party Book: Recipes and Ideas for Galactic Occasions
The Star Wars Party Book: Recipes and Ideas for Galactic Occasions was a book published by Chronicle Books in July of 2002.

The Star Wars Party Book—From the creators of the Star Wars Cookbooks comes an extragalactic party book chock-full of ideas for games, food, crafts, decorations, invitations, costumes, along with shiny foil stickers that are truly out-of-this-world! For the ultimate Star Wars party, choose from six otherworldly themes including Palace Pajama Party, Kamino Camp-Out, Death Star Blowout, and Jabba's Movie Marathon.
